argument.name: fontname
argument.description: The name of a font, its point size, and its attributes in the format "Font_Name[,Point_Size,Attribute_List]".

item.name: Font_Name
item.description: The name of a font, as in Verdana.

item.name: Attribute_List
item.description: Optional. Default = no attributes. May be any of the following:

item.name: or any combination of the three attributes, as in biu.

argument.name: fore_color
argument.description: Optional. Default = "black". The fill color of the text character. A named Alpha Anywhere color or the RGB color code in the format "#R,G,B", where R, G, and B are integers with values between 0 and 255.

argument.name: back_color
argument.description: Optional. Default = "white". The background color of the text character. A named Alpha Anywhere color or the RGB color code in the format "#R,G,B", where R, G, and B are integers with values between 0 and 255.

page.discussion: The SET_FONT() function sets the current Font, foreground color ( Fore_Color ), and background color ( Back_Color ) for text. Limitations: Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
